title: Need a N162 King Kelly got one
author: zljones

posts.post_title: Need a N162 King Kelly got one
posts.post_content: [STRIKE]I am looking to buy a N162 King Kelly in auth to maybe as high as good condition I prefer lowest grades like Auth-poor, for cost reasons.  I only want to buy at fair market value or close.  I have nothing for trade I only want to buy.[/STRIKE]
